channel.title: ROAM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ROAM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Music Booking Agencies Ink Merger Deal In Bid to Rival Major Talent Firms
item.description: Arrival Artists and ATC Live are combining to form the newly-titled Roam, which will rep The Lumineers, Big Thief, Fontaines D.C. and many more acts as they tour.
